code.description: The code that will be distributed to provide a discount.

type.description: The kind of discount to apply. `MoneyOffDiscountCode` applies a flat discount. `PercentOffDiscountCode` applies a percentage discount.

discount_code_type.description: The kind of discount to apply. `MoneyOffDiscountCode` applies a flat discount. `PercentOffDiscountCode` applies a percentage discount.

end_at.description: The time when the discount code becomes unavailable.

max_quantity_per_release.description: Discount only applies to a maxium of this number.

min_quantity_per_release.description: Discount only applies if this many tickets are selected.

only_show_attached.description: Only display tickets attached to this discount code when it is displayed or not e.g. display all publicly visible tickets. Default `false`

quantity.description: The number of tickets that can avail of this discount code.

quantity_used.description: The number of tickets this discount code has been applied to. *Readonly*.

release_ids.description: An array of the IDs of `Releases` the discount code can be applied to.

reveal_secret.description: Should secret tickets be revealed if this discount code is applied or not. Default `false`

start_at.description: The time when the discount code becomes available.

value.description: The amount off per ticket. A percentage or flat amount depending on the discount code type.
